events.Fire Temple Child FW Access:
can_use(Farores_Wind) and
                (at('Deku Tree Lobby', is_child) or
                at('Dodongos Cavern Beginning', is_child) or
                at('Jabu Jabus Belly Beginning', is_child) or
                at('Forest Temple Lobby', is_child) or
                at('Water Temple Lobby', is_child) or
                at('Spirit Temple Lobby', is_child) or
                at('Shadow Temple Entryway', is_child) or
                at('Bottom of the Well', is_child) or
                at('Ice Cavern Beginning', is_child) or
                at('Gerudo Training Grounds Lobby', is_child))
events.Fire Temple Adult FW Access:
can_use(Farores_Wind) and
                (at('Deku Tree Lobby', is_adult) or
                at('Dodongos Cavern Beginning', is_adult) or
                at('Jabu Jabus Belly Beginning', is_adult) or
                at('Forest Temple Lobby', is_adult) or
                at('Water Temple Lobby', is_adult) or
                at('Spirit Temple Lobby', is_adult) or
                at('Shadow Temple Entryway', is_adult) or
                at('Bottom of the Well', is_adult) or
                at('Ice Cavern Beginning', is_adult) or
                at('Gerudo Training Grounds Lobby', is_adult))
events.Fire Temple Child Fairy: has_hearts(2) or 'Fire Temple Child FW Access'
events.Fire Temple Adult Fairy:
is_adult and (Goron_Tunic or has_hearts(5) or 'Fire Temple Adult FW Access' or
                (has_hearts(2) and (Hover_Boots or Hookshot or at('DMC From Warp Pad 2 Hearts', is_adult))))

locations.Fire Temple Near Boss Chest:
can_use(Goron_Tunic) or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                has_hearts(1) and (has_hearts(2) or fire_fairy))
locations.Fairy Pot:
has_bottle and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and has_hearts(2)) and
                (can_use(Hover_Boots) or can_use(Hookshot)))

exits.Fire Temple Boss Room:
is_adult and Boss_Key_Fire_Temple and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and has_hearts(1))) and
                ((logic_fire_boss_door_jump and has_fire_source and (Goron_Tunic or fire_fairy or has_hearts(2))) or
                (Hover_Boots and has_fire_source and (Goron_Tunic or fire_fairy or has_hearts(2))) or
                (Megaton_Hammer and at('Fire Temple Upper', can_play(Song_of_Time) or has_explosives)))

locations.Fire Temple Big Lava Room Lower Open Doo:
can_use(Goron_Tunic) or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and
                has_hearts(1) and (has_hearts(2) or fire_fairy))
locations.Fire Temple Big Lava Room Blocked Door C:
is_adult and has_explosives and
                (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and has_hearts(1) and (has_hearts(3) or
                (fire_fairy and (has_hearts(2) or has_bottles(2))))))
locations.Fire Temple GS Song of Time Room:
is_adult and (can_play(Song_of_Time) or logic_fire_song_of_time) and
                (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and has_hearts(1) and (has_hearts(2) or fire_fairy)))

exits.Fire Temple Lower Maze:
is_adult and (Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 4) and (Progressive_Strength_Upgrade or logic_fire_strength) and
                (has_explosives or Bow or Hookshot) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_fewer_tunic_requirements and has_hearts(1) and
                    (has_hearts(6) or (fire_fairy and has_hearts(2) and (has_hearts(3) or has_bottles(3)))) or
                    (can_use(Farores_Wind) and has_hearts(5)) or
                    ((Hookshot or can_use(Farores_Wind)) and fire_fairy and has_hearts(2) and has_bottles(2)) or
                    ((Hookshot and can_use(Farores_Wind)) and (has_hearts(4) or (fire_fairy and (has_hearts(2) or has_bottles(3)))))))

locations.Fire Temple Map Chest: at('Fire Temple Upper Maze', True) or ((Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 5) and can_use(Bow))

exits.Fire Temple Upper Maze:
(Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 6) and (Goron_Tunic or (Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 7) or
                can_use(Farores_Wind) or has_bottles(4) or has_hearts(3) or (has_hearts(2) and Hookshot and has_bottles(3)))
exits.Fire Temple Upper:
((Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 8) or 
                ((Small_Key_Fire_Temple, 7) and
                    ((can_use(Hover_Boots) and can_use(Megaton_Hammer)) or logic_fire_flame_maze)))

locations.Fire Temple Highest Goron Chest:
can_use(Megaton_Hammer) and 
                (can_play(Song_of_Time) or (logic_rusted_switches and 
                    (can_use(Hover_Boots) or has_explosives)))

events.Defeat Volvagia:
can_use(Megaton_Hammer) and (Goron_Tunic or (logic_volvagia_tunic and has_hearts(3) and 
                    ((has_hearts(4) and (has_hearts(17) or (fire_fairy and (has_hearts(8) or
                        (has_bottles(2) and (has_hearts(6) or (has_bottles(3) and (has_hearts(5) or has_bottles(4))))))))) or
                    (Bow and (has_hearts(14) or (fire_fairy and (has_hearts(7) or
                        (has_bottles(2) and (has_hearts(5) or (has_bottles(3) and (has_hearts(4) or has_bottles(4)))))))))))
